description:
Pursuing financial justice for those injured by the negligent or careless actions of others, we provide focused personal injury services at the Stroud Law Firm in Southaven, Mississippi. Our attorneys proudly represent people and families in Southaven and across north Mississippi, as well as in Memphis, Tennessee, and throughout DeSoto County. We also provide criminal law representation, advocating on behalf of those facing misdemeanor or felony charges.

For 17 years, our law firm has provided compassionate yet straightforward legal counsel that clients can count on. We represent people with cases involving issues such as the following:

  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Premises and product liability
  • Birth injuries, nursing home abuse and medical malpractice
  • Construction accidents and workers' compensation
  • Animal bites

We also assist clients with cases involving brain injuries, and our team represents families in wrongful death claims. When it comes to providing criminal defense representation, our attorneys help clients achieve the most favorable outcomes possible to cases involving matters such as traffic tickets, DUI and DWI, drug violations, sex offenses and white collar crimes.

At the Stroud Law Firm, we know that clients and cases often share similarities. However, we also recognize that no two clients or cases are the same. For that reason, we tailor our advice and representation to suit the needs and objectives of each person we represent. Our firm offers free initial consultations and virtual appointment options, and we accept credit cards.
